instructions_to_main_agent: 2. SETUP: Add the Google Fonts import to 'index.css' or 'App.css'.
3. THEME: Force Dark Mode by default. Add 'dark' class to the html/body tag initially.
4. LAYOUT: Do not use a standard navbar. Use a floating 'Dock' or minimal header.
5. ENCRYPTION: Ensure the 'Encrypting...' state is VISUAL. Show a progress bar or scrambling text effect.
6. QR CODE: Use a library like 'qrcode.react' and style it with a white border so it scans on dark backgrounds.
7. FILE EXTENSIONS: Use .js or .jsx for all React files as per project constraints.
8. TOASTS: Use 'sonner' for all notifications (Link copied, Secret created).
9. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to the main textarea ('secret-input'), create button ('create-btn'), and pin input ('pin-input').
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
